name: BetterGarageStats
description: Adds advanced profile stats to the icon kit!

demons.name: Show Demons
demons.description: Show the amount of demons you have.

demonKeys.name: Show Demon Keys
demonKeys.description: Show the amount of demon keys you have.

goldKeys.name: Show Gold Keys
goldKeys.description: Show the amount of gold keys you have.

show-shards.name: Show Shards
show-shards.description: Show the amount of each shard you have.
